Description.Text:
Property Location
Novotel London West is in the heart of London, walking distance from Broadway Shopping Centre and Hammersmith Apollo. This 4-star hotel is close to Imperial College London and Royal Albert Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 630 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Novotel London West is in the heart of London, walking distance from Broadway Shopping Centre and Hammersmith Apollo. This 4-star hotel is close to Imperial College London and Royal Albert Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Broadway Shopping Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hammersmith Apollo - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Riverside Studios - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Shepherd's Bush Empire - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Holland Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi

Craven Cottage Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

Kensington Roof Gardens - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

Hurlingham Park - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Chiswick House - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Electric Cinema - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 16.1 km / 10 mi
London (LCY-London City) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel London West is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Novotel London West are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 16.1 km / 10 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 37.5 km / 23.3 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel London West is London (LHR-Heathrow).
